<line: 6> EEOC Form 161 (11/16)

[TITLE]
<line: 8> DISMISSAL AND NOTICE OF RIGhTS

[ABANDON]
<line: 10> On behalf of person(s) aggrieved whose identity is.
<line: 11> CONFIDENTIAL (29 CFRS1601.7(a)

[ABANDON]
<line: 13> Daniel Gajda,
<line: 14> Investigator

[ABANDON]
<line: 16> 440-2017-04893

[TITLE]
<line: 18> THE EEOC IS CLOSING ITS FILE ON THIS CHARGE FOR THE FOLLOWING REASON:

[TEXT]
<line: 20> The facts alleged in the charge fail to state a claim under any of the statutes enforced by the EEOC
<line: 21> Your allegations did not involve a disability as defined by the Americans With Disabilities Act.
<line: 22> The Respondent employs less than the required number of employees or is not otherwise covered by the statutes..
<line: 23> Your charge was not timely filed with EEoc; in other words, you waited too long after the date(s) of the alleged
<line: 24> discrimination to file your charge
<line: 25> The EEoc issues the following determination: Based upon its investigation, the EEOc is unable to conclude that the
<line: 26> information obtained establishes violations of the statutes. This does not certify that the respondent is in compliance with
<line: 27> the statutes. No finding is made as to any other issues that might be construed as having been raised by this charge.
<line: 28> The EEOC has adopted the findings of the state or local fair employment practices agency that investigated this charge..
<line: 29> Other (briefly state)

[TITLE]
<line: 31> - NOTICE OF SUIT RIGHTS -

[TEXT]
<line: 33> (See the additional information attached to this form.)

[TEXT]
<line: 35> Title Vll, the Americans with Disabilities Act, the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act, or the Age
<line: 36> Discrimination in Employment Act: This will be the only notice of dismissal and of your right to sue that we will send you.
<line: 37> You may file a lawsuit against the respondent(s) under federal law based on this charge in federal or state court. Your
<line: 38> lawsuit must be filed wIThIN 90 DAYs of your receipt of this notice; or your right to sue based on this charge will be
<line: 39> Iost. (The time limit for filing suit based on a claim under state law may be different.)

[TEXT]
<line: 41> Equal Pay Act (EPA): EPA suits must be filed in federal or state court within 2 years (3 years for willful violations) of the
<line: 42> alleged EPA underpayment. This means that backpay due for any violations that occurred more than 2 years (3 years)
<line: 43> before you file suit may not be collectible..

[FIGURE]
<line: 45> On behalf of the Commission.
<line: 46> Z/4/7

<line: 56> CONTINUING ACTION
<line: 57> THE PARTICULARS ARE (If additional paper is needed, attach extra sheet(s))
<line: 58> I began my employment with Respondent in or around December 2015. My most recent position was
<line: 59> Project Assistant. During my employment, I was subjected to sexual harassment which I rebuffed. I was
<line: 60> then demoted and had responsibilities taken away from me. I was also subjected to derogatory comments
<line: 61> regarding my accent. I complained to no avail. Subsequently, I was discharged on or about January 25,
<line: 62> 2017 while younger, less experienced employees were not.
<line: 63> I believe that I have been discriminated against because of my sex, female, and national/origin Russian, and
<line: 64>  retaliated against for engaging in protected activity, in violation of Titie Vli of tne Civil Rights Act of 1964, as
<line: 65> amended.
<line: 66> JUL 1 3 2017
<line: 67> I believe that I have been discriminated against because of my age, 52 (YOB: 1965), and retaliated against
<line: 68> for engaging in protected activity, in violation of the Age Discrimination in EmploymentActOf196?,FasE
<line: 69> amended.
<line: 70> I want this charge filed with both the EEOC and the State or local Agency, if any. I
<line: 71> NOTARY -- When necessary for State and Local Agency Requirements
<line: 72> will advise the agencies if I change my address or phone number and I will
<line: 73> cooperate fully with them in the processing of my charge in accordance with their
<line: 74> procedures.
<line: 75> I swear or affirm that I have read the above charge and that it is true to
<line: 76>  I declare under penalty of perjury that the above is true and correct
<line: 77> the best of my knowledge, information and belief.
<line: 78> SIGNATURE OF COMPLAINANT
<line: 79> SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME THIS DATE
<line: 80> Jul 13, 2017
<line: 81> (month, day, year)
